entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
